name: grep
description: Fast text search tool. Searches for patterns in file contents using regex or literal matching. Use for finding text across the codebase.

pattern.description: The search pattern (literal text or regex)

path.description: Relative path to search within (optional, defaults to repo root)

case_sensitive.description: Whether the search should be case sensitive (default: false)

regex.description: Treat pattern as a regex (default: false, treats as literal)

context_lines.description: Number of context lines before and after match (default: 2)

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 100)

files_only.description: Only return file names with matches, not individual matches (default: false)
